column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2019
column14: Love this product!  I first put on lipliner and smudge inwards to eliminate a sharp line. Then I apply Lipchic which locks the liner on. Then I appt lipstick.  I personally prefer not to put on top of lipstick because as the day goes on and after eating when you reapply lipstick on top of the Lipchic it can become a bit dry.  Try it out though because it is a good product!  Been using for years.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2015
column14: I put in on over my lipstick in the morning and the lipstick is still perfect by 4:00pm!  I've tried them all and this is the only one that works.  If you eat a salad with dressing the oil may remove a bit of lipstick.  Just check your lips after lunch.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 18, 2016
column14: I have had many women ask me how my lipstick stays on for hours on end.  It does thanks to Lip Chic.  Try one bottle and u will be hooked.  I have used it for 16 years or more.

column6: Put Lipstick on Once a Day

column14: I love LipChic and have used it for years.  I put on lipstick once a day or two at most.  Two coats of LipChic keeps the lipstick on beautifully.
